misc: Primary organizer of the Hector Trophée event.
biography: Toni is a highly accomplished golfer and a familiar face at the Hector Trophée, having participated in every edition since 2022.  A member of Hirsala Golf, Toni's dedication to the game is undeniable, and it shows in his impressive record.

Beyond his consistent participation, Toni boasts a remarkable winning record.  He has secured the coveted Hector Trophée title an impressive three times, achieving victory in Hector Trophée II, IV, and V.  Further cementing his status as a golfing force, he also earned the Victor trophy, awarded to the best individual player, in both Hector Trophée 2021 and 2024.

It's worth noting that Toni's involvement in the Hector Trophée extends beyond his competitive spirit.  As the primary organizer, Toni plays a pivotal role in the success and smooth running of this prestigious invitational tournament. His dedication and hard work are vital to the event's continued growth and success, adding another layer to his already substantial contribution to the world of golf.
